rows.label: qst202514_msg0001
rows.name:
Sorry for the wait, KOS-MOS
Re:. This is what I wanted to
give you. Please accept it!

rows.label: qst202514_msg0002
rows.name: This? For me?

rows.label: qst202514_msg0003
rows.name:
You see, from observing you,
I noticed your power control
is a little lacking.

rows.label: qst202514_msg0004
rows.name:
You must not be able to fully
handle such an overwhelming power.

rows.label: qst202514_msg0005
rows.name:
So, if you use this, you should
be able to control it well.

rows.label: qst202514_msg0006
rows.name:
You'll be able to fight without
worry. I think KOS-MOS Re:
can be even more active.

rows.label: qst202514_msg0007
rows.name: Astelle...[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst202514_msg0008
rows.name: You see, KOS-MOS Re:,

rows.label: qst202514_msg0009
rows.name:
your power is incredibly strong,
but it's also very dangerous.

rows.label: qst202514_msg0010
rows.name:
But I think that power of
yours is absolutely
necessary for this world.

rows.label: qst202514_msg0011
rows.name:
The King and Emperor Nefer said
there's no problem as long as
you have a Driver, but...[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst202514_msg0012
rows.name:
it's frustrating to rely on your
Driver for everything, isn't it?

rows.label: qst202514_msg0013
rows.name:
If you can use that power well
yourself, you can become the
strongest Blade who can save Alst.

rows.label: qst202514_msg0014
rows.name:
It's okay...[ML:Dash ] You're using that power
correctly. I, your best friend, am
saying it, so there's no mistake!

rows.label: qst202514_msg0015
rows.name: When did we become best friends...?[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst202514_msg0016
rows.name:
KOS-MOS Re:, please!
Continue to help everyone.

rows.label: qst202514_msg0017
rows.name:
Helping Rex, Nia, Meleph, and my
uncle will lead to saving Alst!

rows.label: qst202514_msg0018
rows.name: Understood.

rows.label: qst202514_msg0019
rows.name:
However...[ML:Dash ] is it really all
right for me to accept this?

rows.label: qst202514_msg0020
rows.name:
It's a gift from your best friend.
You should accept it, KOS-MOS Re:.

rows.label: qst202514_msg0021
rows.name:
It's a gift from your best
friend, so you should accept it.

rows.label: qst202514_msg0022
rows.name:
It is a precious gift from your
best friend. You should accept it.

rows.label: qst202514_msg0023
rows.name:
It's an important gift from your best
friend, so you should accept it.

rows.label: qst202514_msg0024
rows.name:
I am grateful, Astelle. I
will use it with care.

rows.label: qst202514_msg0025
rows.name: Yes! Come and visit anytime!

rows.label: qst202514_msg0026
rows.name:
Yes, I will definitely come
to see you. As your friend.

rows.label: qst202514_msg0027
rows.name: It's "best friend"!
